thread.title: steve williams
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by steve williams

author: steve williams
title: steve williams
text:
Excellent Customer service from Josh and Karl.
I ordered the wrong size Barbour Jacket, the response from these guys was superb.
2 days to get the replacement, and Country Attire paid for postage.
Highly recommend.
This quality of service is rare in the UK.
Thank you. Steve Williams
